  <header class="site-header" role="banner">
   <nav class="navbar navbar-default" role="navigation">
    <div class="container-fluid">
     <div class="navbar-header">
      <button class="navbar-toggle collapsed" data-target=".main-navigation" data-toggle="collapse" type="button">
       <span class="sr-only">
        Toggle navigation
       </span>
       <i class="fa fa-bars">
       </i>
      </button>
      <a class="navbar-brand" href="https://gracethrufaith.com/" rel="home">
       <h1 class="site-title">
        Grace thru faith
       </h1>
       <h2 class="site-subtitle">
        The Bible made clear &amp; simple.
       </h2>
       <svg class="svg-icon icon-gracethrufaith-logo">
        <use xlink:href="#icon-gracethrufaith-logo">
        </use>
       </svg>
      </a>

  <div class="section section-daily-psalm">
   <div class="daily-psalm">
    <article class="post-13159 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-the-psalms tag-relationships tag-spiritual-gifts tag-spiritual-life gtf_site-featured-psalm">
     <header class="entry-header" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2016/10/psalm-of-the-day.jpg)">
      <div class="article-caption">
       <h2 class="entry-title">
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/the-psalms/psalm-133/" rel="bookmark">
         Psalm 133
        </a>
       </h2>
       <a class="read-more" href="https://gracethrufaith.com/the-psalms/psalm-133/" rel="bookmark">
        Read Today's Psalm
       </a>
      </div>
     </header>
    </article>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="section section-qna container">
   <div class="section-content -bg-dark -p-md">
    <div class="content-listing -grid-1">
     <div class="content__item">
      <div class="card -horizontal">
       <div class="card__media-wrap">
        <div class="card__media -full" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2016/11/bibleQA.jpg)">
         <div class="article-caption">
          <h2>
           Today's Bible Q&amp;A
          </h2>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content-wrap">
        <div class="card__content">
         <ul class="qna-posts">
          <li class="qna-post">
           <div class="card -horizontal -compact -no-shadow">
            <div class="card__content-wrap -small -tall">
             <div class="card__content">
              <h3 class="card-title">
               <a class="card-title__link" href="/ask-a-bible-teacher/more-on-being-unequally-yoked/" title="More On Being Unequally Yoked">
                More On Being Unequally Yoked
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="card-description">
               <p>
                According to 2 Cor 6:14, the Bible doesn’t allow believers to be unequally yoked with non believers (Marriage)? Is it then a sin or also not allowable for a pastor to marry the two should they insist? Or is marriage on it’s own only applicable or was established for believers only?
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="card__actions -no-border">
              <a class="card-button read-more" href="/ask-a-bible-teacher/more-on-being-unequally-yoked/">
               Read More
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </li>
          <li class="qna-post">
           <div class="card -horizontal -compact -no-shadow">
            <div class="card__content-wrap -small -tall">
             <div class="card__content">
              <h3 class="card-title">
               <a class="card-title__link" href="/ask-a-bible-teacher/this-kind-of-demon-or-this-kind-of-faith/" title="This Kind Of Demon Or This Kind Of Faith?">
                This Kind Of Demon Or This Kind Of Faith?
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="card-description">
               <p>
                I just read an interesting answer you gave concerning sentence construction, pronouns, etc. It reminded me of this passage of scripture that I believe many have misunderstood, which is Matthew 17:20-21, which states, “This kind comes out only by prayer and fasting.” Looking at the nearest noun, this passage would be talking about this kind of unbelief, not this kind of demon (King James version.) (Interestingly, the NIV deletes verse 21 altogether.) So what do you think…is “this kind” referring to this kind of demon or this kind of unbelief?
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="card__actions -no-border">
              <a class="card-button read-more" href="/ask-a-bible-teacher/this-kind-of-demon-or-this-kind-of-faith/">
               Read More
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </li>
          <li class="qna-post">
           <div class="card -horizontal -compact -no-shadow">
            <div class="card__content-wrap -small -tall">
             <div class="card__content">
              <h3 class="card-title">
               <a class="card-title__link" href="/ask-a-bible-teacher/am-i-worthy-to-escape/" title="Am I Worthy To Escape?">
                Am I Worthy To Escape?
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="card-description">
               <p>
                RE:Luke 21:36 – Jesus says “pray that you be counted worthy to escape these things” – meaning the horrors of God’s judgment. This scripture troubles me as I sometimes wonder if I AM worthy, even though I am a born-again, Spirit-filled Christian who loves the Lord and is serving Him to the best of the talents and abilities that He has given me. I have always believed in the pre-Trib Rapture, but this verse seems to suggest that there are some Christians who won’t make it.
               </p>
               <p>
                Also – it has been reported that we, meaning the Church of this age, is the Laodocian church – the one that Jesus said He would spit out of His mouth because it was neither hot nor cold, but lukewarm. I tend to agree with this as I see very few churches, including my own, that are truly on fire for God.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="card__actions -no-border">
              <a class="card-button read-more" href="/ask-a-bible-teacher/am-i-worthy-to-escape/">
               Read More
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="section section-headlines container">
   <div class="section-content -bg-dark -p-md">
    <div class="content-listing -grid-1">
     <div class="content__item">
      <div class="card -horizontal">
       <div class="card__media-wrap">
        <div class="card__media" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2018/06/week-in-review-june23.jpg)">
         <a class="card__media-link" href="/blog/week-review-june-23/">
          Read Latest Blog Post
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content-wrap">
        <div class="card__content">
         <h3 class="card-title">
          <a class="card-title__link" href="/blog/week-review-june-23/">
           Latest Blog Post
          </a>
         </h3>
         <h4 class="card-subtitle">
          Saturday, June 23, 2018
          <br/>
          <a class="card-title__link" href="/blog/week-review-june-23/">
          </a>
         </h4>
         <hr class="divider"/>
         <div class="card-description">
          <span style="font-size:2.2rem;">
           Week in review June 23
          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="card__actions">
         <a class="card-button read-more" href="/blog/week-review-june-23/">
          Read Latest Blog Post
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="section section-feature-article container">
   <h3 class="section-heading">
    <span>
     Feature Article
    </span>
   </h3>
   <article class="post-42591 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-topical-studies tag-featured tag-jesus tag-salvation tag-theology gtf_site-featured">
    <header class="entry-header" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2016/09/GraceThruFaith148.jpg)">
     <div class="article-caption">
      <h2 class="entry-title">
       <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/topical-studies/is-jesus-god-in-human-form/" rel="bookmark">
        Is Jesus God In Human Form?
       </a>
      </h2>
      <div class="entry-meta">
       <span class="posted-on">
        <time class="entry-date published updated" datetime="2018-06-20T00:00:00+00:00">
         Wednesday June 20th, 2018
        </time>
       </span>
       <span class="time-to-read">
        About 13 Minutes to Read
       </span>
      </div>
     </div>
    </header>
    <div class="entry-content">
     <p>
      A Bible Study by Jack Kelley
     </p>
     <p>
      Recently my belief that Jesus is God in human form was challenged again. This has happened to me several times in the past and while I’ve laid out the Biblical basis for my belief in several articles I’ve never specifically addressed the common objections others have put forth.
     </p>
     <a class="read-more" href="/topical-studies/is-jesus-god-in-human-form/" rel="bookmark">
      Read More
     </a>
    </div>
   </article>
  </div>
  <div class="section section-teasers container">
   <div class="section-content -bg-dark -p-xs">
    <div class="content-listing -grid-2">
     <div class="content__item">
      <div class="card -horizontal -compact">
       <div class="card__media-wrap -square -small">
        <div class="card__media -full" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2014/11/galatians.jpg)">
         <a class="card__media-link" href="/verse-by-verse/galatians-part-5/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content-wrap">
        <div class="card__content">
         <span class="card-intro">
          <svg class="card-intro__icon svg-icon icon-lamp">
           <use xlink:href="#icon-lamp">
           </use>
          </svg>
          Previous Feature Article
         </span>
         <h3 class="card-title">
          <a class="card-title__link" href="/verse-by-verse/galatians-part-5/">
           Galatians 5
          </a>
         </h3>
         <hr class="divider"/>
         <div class="card-description">
          <p>
           A Bible Study by Jack Kelley
          </p>
          <p>
           Part 5.  The conclusion of Paul’s case against combining Law and Grace
          </p>
          <p>
           We’ve arrived at the final chapter of Paul’s letter to the Galatians, where Paul has presented a strong case against combining Law and Grace. In effect, he has said the two are like oil and water;
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="card__actions">
         <a class="card-button read-more" href="/verse-by-verse/galatians-part-5/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="content__item">
      <div class="card -horizontal -compact">
       <div class="card__media-wrap -square -small">
        <div class="card__media -full" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2017/07/GTF-church-india-16-1024x341.jpg)">
         <a class="card__media-link" href="/outreach/india-outreach-childrens-church/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content-wrap">
        <div class="card__content">
         <span class="card-intro">
          <svg class="card-intro__icon svg-icon icon-tree">
           <use xlink:href="#icon-tree">
           </use>
          </svg>
          Our Outreach Work
         </span>
         <h3 class="card-title">
          <a class="card-title__link" href="/outreach/india-outreach-childrens-church/">
           India Outreach – Children’s Church!
          </a>
         </h3>
         <hr class="divider"/>
         <div class="card-description">
          <p>
           It’s official! We’ve begun a Children’s Church for the tribe we’ve been serving in India. Our Spring Bible School outreach was such a success, the tribe asked us to keep coming every week to minister to the children. After much prayer, we’re moving forward!
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="card__actions">
         <a class="card-button read-more" href="/outreach/india-outreach-childrens-church/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="content__item">
      <div class="card -horizontal -compact">
       <div class="card__media-wrap -small">
        <div class="card__media -full -bg-dark" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2017/12/bible-stories-cover.jpg)">
         <a class="card__media-link" href="/books/bible-stories-adults/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content-wrap">
        <div class="card__content">
         <span class="card-intro">
          <svg class="card-intro__icon svg-icon icon-ebook">
           <use xlink:href="#icon-ebook">
           </use>
          </svg>
          Feature eBook
         </span>
         <h3 class="card-title">
          <a class="card-title__link" href="/books/bible-stories-adults/">
           Bible Stories for Adults
          </a>
         </h3>
         <hr class="divider"/>
         <div class="card-description">
          <p>
           **
           <a href="https://www.amazon.com/Bible-Stories-Adults-familiar-childhood-ebook/dp/B07BFQN7DP/ref=sr_1_4?ie=UTF8&amp;qid=1521648132&amp;sr=8-4&amp;keywords=bible+stories+for+adults">
            Print version
           </a>
           now available on Amazon!
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Volumes I &amp;II, Old and New Testament stories.
           </strong>
           <br/>
           Jack published the Old Testament stories in 2004, and by the time he was ready to ready to publish the New Testament stories, he wanted to release them in one volume.
          </p>
          <p>
           Now, I am so blessed to present to you Jack’s teachings on the children’s stories in the Bible. In this new book, including Volumes I and II—the Old Testament and New Testament—you’ll discover how the language, customs, and culture of biblical times will help you grow in a more mature understanding of these timeless children’s stories. I’m excited for you! The details and symbolism of these stories are about to make the Word of God come alive in your heart. Prepare to have your faith strengthened as you grow closer to the Lord.
           <br/>
           ♥ Samantha Kelley
          </p>
          <p>
           ⇒You can now purchase a print version from
           <a href="https://www.amazon.com/Bible-Stories-Adults-Familiar-Childhood/dp/1978369964">
            Amazon here.
           </a>
           Please leave a review on Amazon once you’ve read it!
          </p>
          <p style="text-align: center;">
           ⇓Click on one of the three formats below to download now for free.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="card__actions">
         <a class="card-button read-more" href="/books/bible-stories-adults/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="content__item">
      <div class="card -horizontal -compact">
       <div class="card__media-wrap -small">
        <div class="card__media -full" style="background-image:url(/assets/uploads/2017/03/book-of-daniel.jpg)">
         <a class="card__media-link" href="/audio/the-book-of-daniel/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content-wrap -small -tall">
        <div class="card__content">
         <span class="card-intro">
          <svg class="card-intro__icon svg-icon icon-headphones">
           <use xlink:href="#icon-headphones">
           </use>
          </svg>
          Feature Audio Study
         </span>
         <h3 class="card-title">
          <a class="card-title__link" href="/audio/the-book-of-daniel/">
           The Book of Daniel
          </a>
         </h3>
         <hr class="divider"/>
         <div class="card-description">
          <p>
           Daniel’s story is like none other. Taken hostage to Babylon as a teenager, he rose to become chief adviser to two world leaders, Babylon’s King Nebuchadnezzar and Media-Persia’s King Darius.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="card__actions">
         <a class="card-button read-more" href="/audio/the-book-of-daniel/">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>

         </h4>

          Links to news articles of prophetic significance.
         </p>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="menu-item has-icon">
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/audio">
         <svg class="svg-icon icon-headphones">
          <use xlink:href="#icon-headphones">
          </use>
         </svg>
         <h4 class="menu-item__title">
          Free Audio Studies
         </h4>
         <p class="menu-item__subtitle">
          Listen to our Bible studies now from your browser. You can also download them to your computer, phone, or tablet.
         </p>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="menu-item has-icon">
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/books">
         <svg class="svg-icon icon-ebook">
          <use xlink:href="#icon-ebook">
          </use>
         </svg>
         <h4 class="menu-item__title">
          Free eBooks
         </h4>
         <p class="menu-item__subtitle">
          Download our eBooks to read on your computers, phone, tablet, or eReader.
         </p>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="menu-item has-icon">
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/outreach">
         <svg class="svg-icon icon-tree">
          <use xlink:href="#icon-tree">
          </use>
         </svg>
         <h4 class="menu-item__title">
          Our Outreach Projects
         </h4>
         <p class="menu-item__subtitle">
          We grow food to support a community, build and repair homes, and support the poor, widows, and the fatherless.
         </p>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
     <div class="footer-about col-md-3 col-md-pull-9">
      <h4>
       <img alt="jack-kelley-sm" class="alignleft size-full wp-image-78148" height="180" src="https://gracethrufaith.com/assets/uploads/2016/10/jack-kelley-sm.jpg" width="180"/>
       <br/>
       About Grace thru Faith
      </h4>
      <ul class="footer-about-nav">
       <li>
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/about/">
         Who we are
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/about/timeline/">
         How we began
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/about/about-our-beliefs/">
         Our beliefs
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       Jack Kelley published over 9,000 Bible Study resources here from 1999, until the Lord called him home in the fall of 2015. His teachings made the Bible clear and easy to understand, and impacted millions of lives. He is the author of all the teachings here, and all materials are available free of charge! His wife Samantha maintains this site as well as their missionary outreaches.
      </p>
      <ul class="footer-sub-nav">
       <li class="menu-item menu-contact-us">
        <a href="https://gracethrufaith.com/contact/">
         <i class="fa fa-envelope">
         </i>
         <span class="fontawesome-text">
          Contact Us
         </span>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="menu-item menu-en-espanol">
        <a href="/es">
         <i class="fa fa-globe">
         </i>
         <span class="fontawesome-text">
          En Español
         </span>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var fb_timeout, fb_opts={"overlayShow":true,"hideOnOverlayClick":true,"showCloseButton":true,"margin":20,"centerOnScroll":true,"enableEscapeButton":true,"autoScale":true,"scriptPriority":10 };
if(typeof easy_fancybox_handler==="undefined"){
var easy_fancybox_handler=function(){
jQuery(".nofancybox,a.pin-it-button,a[href*="pinterest.com/pin/create"]").addClass("nolightbox");
/* IMG */
var fb_IMG_select="a[href*=".jpg"]:not(.nolightbox,li.nolightbox>a),area[href*=".jpg"]:not(.nolightbox),a[href*=".jpeg"]:not(.nolightbox,li.nolightbox>a),area[href*=".jpeg"]:not(.nolightbox),a[href*=".png"]:not(.nolightbox,li.nolightbox>a),area[href*=".png"]:not(.nolightbox)";
jQuery(fb_IMG_select).addClass("fancybox image");
var fb_IMG_sections = jQuery("div.gallery");
fb_IMG_sections.each(function(){jQuery(this).find(fb_IMG_select).attr("rel","gallery-"+fb_IMG_sections.index(this));});
jQuery("a.fancybox,area.fancybox,li.fancybox a").each(function(){jQuery(this).fancybox(jQuery.extend({},fb_opts,{"transitionIn":"elastic","easingIn":"easeOutBack","transitionOut":"elastic","easingOut":"easeInBack","opacity":false,"hideOnContentClick":false,"titleShow":false,"titlePosition":"over","titleFromAlt":true,"showNavArrows":true,"enableKeyboardNav":true,"cyclic":false}))});};
jQuery("a.fancybox-close").on("click",function(e){e.preventDefault();jQuery.fancybox.close()});
};
var easy_fancybox_auto=function(){setTimeout(function(){jQuery("#fancybox-auto").trigger("click")},1000);};
jQuery(easy_fancybox_handler);jQuery(document).on("post-load",easy_fancybox_handler);
jQuery(easy_fancybox_auto);
  </script>

    settings: {
      bibleVersion: "NIV",
      roundCorners: true,

        heading: {
          fontSize : "18px"
